name: family_history
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in an ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Indicate if patient has any genetic relatives with a history of cancer. (Reference: NCIt C159104, caDSR CDE ID 6161023)
fields.name: relative_with_cancer_history

fields.description: Indicate genetic relationship of the relative to patient. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2179937)
fields.name: relationship_type

fields.description: The self-reported gender of related individual.
fields.name: gender_of_relative

fields.description: The age (in years) when the patient's relative was first diagnosed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5300571)
fields.name: age_of_relative_at_diagnosis
disease_icd10_of_relative
fields.description: The code to describe the malignant diagnosis of the patient's relative with a history of cancer using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.
Indicate if the patient's relative died from the cancer they were diagnosed with.
fields.name: relative_death_status

fields.description: Indicate how long, in years, the relative survived from the time of diagnosis if the patient's relative died from the cancer they were diagnosed with.
fields.name: relative_survival_time
